title: Keeping Zion In New Orleans, Bucks' Physicality
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN’s Marc J. Spears and Andrew Lopez to talk Zion’s thoughts on the Pelicans postseason performance, the future in New Orleans, the Bucks' physicality against the Celtics, the Warriors escaping with Game 1 and Devin Booker’s competitiveness.

itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collective: What Does The Future Look Like For The Roster In New Orleans?
